attributes.action: PM to read this into official parliamentary record and agree to the sentiments.
attributes.additional_details:
4. Any deal agreed with the EU is not one agreed to by the referendum vote and will be considered an act of detrayal.
5. Any attempt to rejoin the EU at any future date will be considered an act of treason against the people and state of the United Kingdom. 

Parliament: Your bosses, the People, are watching you and will hold you to account for your treacherous behaviour. "
attributes.background:
"We, the people, wish it to been known that:-
1. Our being joined to the EEC was achieved by act of treason. 
2. Continuing that treason was in itself an act of treason. 
3. Delaying or diluting our Brexit to WTO rules will also be considered an act of treason.

rejection.details: We can only accept petitions which call for actions that are the responsibility of the UK Government or Parliament. This would be a decision for the Prime Minister and not the responsibility of the UK Government or the UK Parliament as a whole.
